mail.title: [Knowledge] Add Participant {KnowledgeId} - {KnowledgeTitle}
mail.description:
Service send a notice on add a participant for event.
[Reserved keywords] If you write the following keywords in the body, replace the value when sending mail.
- {URL} : Access URL to Knowledge - {Participant} : Participant - {KnowledgeId} : ID - {KnowledgeTitle} : Title
